coreAtributes.authorTag: On the inside of each forearm pad, faint rubberised ink reads "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Threadworks."
coreAtributes.name: Enforcer's riot arm guards
coreAtributes.description: A pair of metallic elbow pads and forearm guards attached to partial sleeves of ballistic fibres. They attach to the wearer's arms via adjustable straps

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slip)] the arm guards over [npc.her] forearms and [npc.verb(tighten)] the straps.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slip)] the arm guards over [npc2.namePos] forearms and [npc.verb(tighten)] the straps.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(stuff)] [npc2.namePos] forearms through the arm guards and hastily [npc.verb(tighten)] the straps.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(loosen)] the straps on [npc.her] arm guards and [npc.verb(slip)] them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(loosen)] the straps on [npc2.namePos] arm guards and [npc.verb(slip)] them off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] at the straps on [npc2.namePos] arm guards until they're loose enough and [npc.verb(toss)] them aside.
